verbose_text: Wang et al, revealed that NAC and allopurinol reduce myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in diabetes by activating the phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K)/protein kinase B (Akt) and Janus kinase 2/signal transducer and activator of transcription 3 pathways.
